scripts.setup: npm install --silent && tsc --build && powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path .env)) { echo 'OPENAI_API_KEY=' > .env }; if (!(Test-Path storage)) { mkdir storage }; echo 'LOG START' > storage/log.txt"

config.checkEnv: node -e "if(!require('fs').readFileSync('.env','utf8').match(/OPENAI_API_KEY=.+/)){console.error('\u001b[31mError: OPENAI_API_KEY not set in .env file\u001b[0m');process.exit(1)}"
